title: Cruel Sting
content: Cruel Sting Rare 2~11 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d10 (1d8)+1 Slashing Sting The Helpless: A drow elf wielding this weapon deals an additional 1~4 Poison damage against Restrained targets. Weapon Enchantment +1 Ensnaring Strands Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: The trauma of becoming a drider is quickly set aside with a cold arachnid dispassion. This sword follows that disturbing trend, a replenishing poison gland is built within, deployed only against trapped opponent
